hero.title: Turn Contracts Into Clarity
hero.subtitle: Contracts are at the heart of every business, but managing them is often messy—buried in PDFs, hard to track, and risky to interpret manually. Contract Intelligence transforms your agreements into structured, searchable, and actionable insights. From clause analysis and risk flagging to renewal tracking and compliance monitoring, our platform ensures you never miss an obligation, deadline, or exposure hidden in fine print.

features.title: Uncover Insights, Ensure Integrity
features.subtitle: Our intelligent audit platform covers everything from anomaly detection to regulatory compliance, so you don’t have to.

items.title: Clause & Obligation Analysis
items.description: AI reads and classifies every clause — payment terms, termination rights, indemnities, non-competes — surfacing obligations and risks instantly.

items.title: Risk Flagging
items.description: Identify hidden risks like unlimited liability, auto-renewal traps, compliance gaps, or unusual obligations before they become costly issues.

items.title: Lifecycle & Renewal Tracking
items.description: Automatically track key dates such as contract start, expiry, and renewal windows — with proactive reminders and alerts.

items.title: Regulatory & Compliance Mapping
items.description: Map contracts against regulatory frameworks to ensure disclosures, covenants, and obligations are being met without manual tracking.

items.title: Centralized Repository
items.description: Securely store and search all agreements in one place — with OCR and semantic search making even scanned PDFs fully accessible.

items.title: Deal & M&A Support
items.description: Accelerate due diligence for investments or acquisitions by rapidly summarizing thousands of contracts, highlighting liabilities and key terms.

items.title: Confidentiality & Access Control
items.description: Granular access permissions ensure sensitive agreements remain secure, while audit logs track every review and change.

detailSection.title: Put Contracts in Auto Pilot
detailSection.description:
Contract Intelligence turns messy, unread contracts into structured, actionable insights:
  • Upload or sync contracts in any format, and Saras automatically extracts clauses, key dates, and obligations.
  • AI flags hidden risks — like auto-renewals, unlimited liability, or compliance gaps — so your team can act before issues escalate.
  • Track renewals, obligations, and risks through dashboards, reminders, and portfolio-level reports for total visibility and control.

cta.title: Every Contract. Every Clause. Total Control.
cta.subtitle: Stop losing time and money to missed renewals, hidden risks, and unread fine print. With Contract Intelligence, your agreements become a strategic advantage, not an administrative burden.
